Congratulations on adding a signed Mike Trout baseball to your collection!

Mike Trout is widely regarded as one of the greatest baseball players of his generation, and his achievements and awards are a testament to his incredible talent and dedication to the sport. Here are some of his notable accomplishments:

**Awards and Accolades:**

* 8x All-Star (2012-2019)
* 2x American League (AL) Most Valuable Player (MVP) (2014, 2016)
* 7x Silver Slugger Award winner (2012-2016, 2018, 2019)
* 2x AL Hank Aaron Award winner (2014, 2016)
* 1x AL Rookie of the Year (2012)

**Career Statistics:**

* .305 Batting Average
* 292 Home Runs
* 761 Runs Batted In (RBIs)
* 1,087 Runs Scored
* 205 Stolen Bases

**Other Notable Achievements:**

* Led the AL in WAR (Wins Above Replacement) seven times (2012-2016, 2018, 2019)
* Led the AL in OPS (On-Base Plus Slugging) four times (2013, 2015, 2016, 2018)
* Led the AL in Home Runs twice (2014, 2016)
* Member of the 30-30 Club (30 home runs, 30 stolen bases) twice (2012, 2016)

**Contract and Legacy:**

* Signed a 12-year, $426.5 million contract extension with the Los Angeles Angels in 2019, one of the largest contracts in sports history
* Considered one of the greatest players of his generation, alongside players like Bryce Harper and Christian Yelich
* Has been named the face of Major League Baseball by many media outlets and fans

Your signed baseball is a great addition to your collection! Mike Trout is a legend in the making, and his autograph will likely only appreciate in value over time. Enjoy displaying it proudly alongside your other 14 autographed baseballs!
